mapper.sql: a.log_id AS "logId", a.merchant_no AS "merchantNo", a.check_file_from AS "checkFileFrom", a.check_file_where AS "checkFileWhere", a.file_name AS "fileName", a.file_dir AS "fileDir", a.oper_person AS "operPerson", a.oper_time AS "operTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tpds_file_log( log_id, merchant_no, check_file_from, check_file_where, file_name, file_dir, oper_person, oper_time ) VALUES ( #{logId}, #{merchantNo}, #{checkFileFrom}, #{checkFileWhere}, #{fileName}, #{fileDir}, #{operPerson}, #{operTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tpds_file_log SET log_id = #{logId}, merchant_no = #{merchantNo}, check_file_from = #{checkFileFrom}, check_file_where = #{checkFileWhere}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_dir = #{fileDir}, oper_person = #{operPerson}, oper_time = #{operTime} WHERE id = #{id}

update tpds_file_log
merchant_no = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_file_from = #{checkFileFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_file_where = #{checkFileWhere,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_dir = #{fileDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_person = #{operPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_time = #{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
